QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Hemorrhagic
QAPair.Answer: Hemorrhage is the medical term for bleeding. It most often refers to excessive bleeding. Hemorrhagic diseases are caused by bleeding, or they result in bleeding (hemorrhaging). Related topics include: Primary thrombocythemia (hemorrhagic thrombocythemia), Stroke , Yellow fever , Bleeding disorders , Ebola fever , Dengue hemorrhagic fever , Vitamin K deficiency ,
